General.Name: Benefit Systems SA
General.Description: Benefit Systems S.A. provides non-wage employee benefits solutions in Poland and internationally. The company offers Multisport card, which provides access to sports and leisure facilities; MyBenefit that offers tourist, cultural, sports, and recreational benefits; BenefitLunch Card to find eating places near the user; MultiBilet for watching films; MultiTeatr, which allows admission to selected theatrical performances based on individual preferences and needs; MultiLife that provides various services for daily care of health, well-being, and personal development; MultiMuzeum that can be redeemed for a ticket to a museum or a center of science; and MultiZoo, which can be redeemed for a ticket to the zoos. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
